title: Fire Separation - means the distance in meters measured from any other building on the site, or from other site, or from the opposite side of a street or other public space to the building
clause_text: Fire Separation - means the distance in meters measured from any other building on the site, or from other site, or from the opposite side of a street or other public space to the building.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
